greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor(sigma(sigma(n))/n) = floor(A051027(n)/n).
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..25000
example: For n=10, a(10) = floor(sigma(sigma(10))/10) = floor(sigma(18)/10) = floor(39/10) = 3.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 25 2004
